sentence: The door could not be opened from the inside or outside so my partner had to call the front desk for a locksmith
so they got double the tip for a not so great service
Hotels could use more employees like him
Very expensive for what it was and poor quality and service
This can easily be a 4 star with more renovations and faster service
they definitely need more staff to effectively cover the guests
That being said from our first interaction with the check in desk we started on a good note
The last night we were there my daughter did not feel well and we reluctantly tried simple fare from room service not included you have to pay for it
remember if on an all inclusive please tip the staff when getting drinks etc and housekeeping the locals were so welcoming

The attendant at the hotel was nice BUT she did not seem to want to help every time she spoke to a new customer service rep she would start by saying i spoke to someone and confirmed the package is NOT all inclusive
Food is average to excellent drinks are strong and bar staff was on point
Some staff were friendly and helpful but many were not happy and rude

Some of the people that made it extra special include Aaron barback Decienzo bartender Edmund AKA Derek bartender Rodrique server at Marketplace Antonio server at Black Angus Rashad Level staff Enrique beverage director Deamarto bartender Denver sever at Aqua
Day 1 Got in late evening 8 pm receptionist was very sweet
Sitting on the beach we were to get service never happened we had to walk and get our drinks and food and wait forever
While the staff was quite nice the overall property was really lacking
I talked to many staff servers and bar tenders they all said they wish there could be more Bahamian culture infused into the resort
I especially wanted to acknowledge a few staff members
Room service is included with the level lounge
so The Level called the bell desk and told them to send someone up to get our bags and hold on to them for us until we could get a new room

starbucks we highly recommend you have a secret shopper undercover staff experience this site it ’s site number 76 so shocked we looked it up at different times of the day and report back as it ’s certainly not representative of what we have experienced with your brand
The manager on staff did not help at all
First time at both the food and service was very good but the second time the food and service was blah
The adult pool was always merky but the beaches and staff were both amazing
Your job as a hotel is to provide services not deny services
Also room service is included with The Level and we found that to be the best food in the resort
Such a shame to make it like this which prevents many guests from going there as its such a beautiful restaurant great staff and food
That is so cheap looking MeliaBefore you were able to see the general manager on the floors during the day and the service managers present most of the time
Then you sit down with a member of The LEVEL staff and go through your check in process
The restaurants exceeded my expectations in both service and food quality
And when he was there we got monosyllabic grunts instead of any semblance of friendly service
The other wait staff seemed sparse and service was spotty

Room was large and clean except for the used bottles of cups on our balcony ok you can forgive as it happens but whilst on the subject of rooms ours was n’t cleaned for 2 days despite leaving the request on the door handle daily so we had to request for water to replaced from the reception and toilet roll clean towels from any of the carts we passed
14 staff friendly and genuine others were mean or flat out miserable
The only complaint I had was the bed was too hard but the staff did what they could to put more bedding on top of it to soften it up
But 6 calls and visits to the front desk and concierge later over 2 days we still could n’t get an in room safe
Housekeeping was above average rooms seem to be of a nice standard safe in room and room service was included in the plan
it sometimes takes a while to actually get your drink rough service also note wifi is not in the room some had it others did not based on location to the lobby
The staff was ok with getting people involved in dancing trivia etc but the bar tenders personalities lacked as did some of the waitresses in the Marketplace restaurant
The staff was very rude and harassed me and my wife for someone else stupidly and made us uncomfortable to the point we had to go to another hotel because we did not feel safe
